iti65:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti65:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these kinds of good conduct.
iti65:2.3: Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
iti65:2.4: These are the three kinds of good conduct.”
iti65:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti65:4.3: when their body breaks up, that wise person
iti65:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
